org.apache.ignite.streamer.index.hash

Class StreamerHashIndexProvider<E,K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.streamer.index.StreamerIndexProviderAdapter<E,K,V>
      • org.apache.ignite.streamer.index.hash.StreamerHashIndexProvider<E,K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamerIndexProvider<E,K,V>, StreamerIndexProviderMBean

    public class StreamerHashIndexProvider<E,K,V>
extends StreamerIndexProviderAdapter<E,K,V>
    Hash index implementation of a StreamerIndexProvider.

    This implementation uses a concurrent hash map, which is extremely efficient for CRUD operations. It does not, however, maintain the ordering of entries, so, operations which imply ordering are not supported.

    If ordering is required, consider using StreamerTreeIndexProvider.

    See Also:
    StreamerTreeIndexProvider
